services_included.name: Smart City Lights application
services_included.long_description: Smart City Lights application is a valuable utility for incidents management and control of Smart City entities. The user has two different mashups that serve as a UI for the back-end application and leverage on a number of FIWARE generic enablers. One of the mashups facilitates the real-time management of incidents, while the other allows for the analysis of historical information gathered from each of Smart City entities.

resources.name: History Mod
resources.description: The History mod is in charge of maintain historical info of Smart City Lights entities

resources.name: Orion Context Broker
resources.description: The Orion Context Broker is an implementation of the Publish/Subscribe Context Broker GE, providing the NGSI9 and NGSI10 interfaces.

resources.name: Protocol adapter
resources.description: A Gateway Protocol Adapter GE is capable to handle one of the protocols used by IoT Devices that are accepted in FIWARE

resources.name: CEP
resources.description: The CEP GE analyses event data in real-time, generates immediate insight and enables instant response to changing conditions

resources.name: Location service
resources.description: The Location Server (LOCS) is a Thales Alenia Space France (TAS-F) platform dedicated to location management of wireless devices
